title: Web Development using Python
description: The bootcamp aims to teach programming methods and thinking like a programmer in approaching problem-solving during the development of various projects from conception to project organization and development steps, and learning how the internet works and web development using the Django framework. The trainee will become highly confident in using Python and start building projects that serve individuals and society.
goals: Knowledge of the basics of using the CLI to control the computer.

Mastering the use of GIT to track project versions, as well as using one of the GIT repository hosting service providers like GitHub and methods of team collaboration to build a project using Git and GitHub.
Mastering the basics of Python and using it effectively.
Understanding the workings of the internet and the web.
Basics of building web pages and interfaces using HTML and styling them using CSS.
Mastering the use of the Django framework for building websites.
Mastering the use of ORM to interact with databases.
Mastering the process of user authentication.
Mastering the process of granting permissions and verifying them.
Daily practical assignments throughout the bootcamp.
4 projects at the end of each unit.
Final Capstone project.
features: Bootcamp ending with employment for outstanding participants.
Learning methodology based on practical applications.
Supportive and competitive learning environment.
Encouragement of self-learning.
Acquisition of important programming skills.
Guidance and mentoring from technical experts to ensure optimal skill acquisition.
requirements: The applicant must be of Saudi nationality.
Bringing a personal laptop.
Bachelor's degree in a technical field.
Passion for learning and development.
Commitment to participation and submitting daily assignments.
Dedication to the bootcamp and maximizing the benefit.

title: Web Development using Java
description: The bootcamp aims to teach Java programming at beginner and intermediate levels to build advanced and professional servers using the Spring Boot framework according to the highest standards and best academic practices, preparing students with the necessary skills and knowledge to become professional Backend web developers capable of facing labor market challenges and providing innovative and effective technical solutions.

Learning how to use the Integrated Development Environment (IDE) to execute programs and debug errors.

Applying programming skills to build servers using the Spring Boot framework.
Learning how to test REST APIs built within the server using Postman.
Enabling students to grasp the basic concepts of databases.
Developing SQL programming skills and building databases through it.
Using ORM tools in Java to control databases.
Enabling students to grasp the basic concepts of security and the importance of applying it.

Developing server testing skills through learning JUnit testing and applying it to the server.
Building advanced, secure, and integrated websites that simulate real-world projects.

title: Data Science and Machine Learning
description: The Data Science and Machine Learning bootcamp aims to introduce data science and how to handle different types of data. This bootcamp takes an applied approach focusing on developing practical skills through real-world projects where participants learn how to extract and analyze data and use modern machine learning techniques to build predictive analytical models aimed at solving practical problems and business development.

Understanding data types and the challenges that may arise when dealing with them.
Applying machine learning principles in data analysis and modeling to solve real problems.
Developing participants' ability to present project results professionally and understandably.

Projects implemented during the bootcamp are based on real data from various fields, not just data designed specifically for educational purposes.

title: Game Development using Unity
description: An intensive bootcamp in game development using the Unity engine, covering programming in C#, scene design, physics handling, user interfaces, animation, visual programming, and developing 2D and 3D games, in addition to the principles of publishing on various platforms. The bootcamp relies on weekly individual projects that enhance practical skills and ensures the accumulation of knowledge in a practical and systematic manner to enhance practical application, concluding with a group project to develop a complete game and publish it.

Learning about the latest tools and techniques used in game development to ensure the ability to keep up with market developments.
Understanding the basics of object-oriented programming, C# programming, Unity, modeling in Unity, animation, game design rules, and building a strong knowledge base about them.

Training on using professional tools like Git, GitHub to develop technical skills.
Mastering the design and development of PC and mobile games using the latest methodologies.
Enhancing design thinking and problem-solving skills to provide innovative and practical solutions.

Enhancing creative thinking and the ability to develop innovative technical solutions that meet the needs of users and companies.
Participating in interactive workshops and discussion sessions with specialists to gain in-depth professional insights.
Motivating participants to continue self-learning and development to keep up with rapid changes in the field.

title: 3D Design Techniques
description: The bootcamp aims to provide trainees with basic skills in 3D design through practical applications using Blender and Maya software, and knowledge of character design and building 3D environments, and implementing practical projects usable in video games and animation fields. The bootcamp is an ideal choice for beginners and those interested in creative technologies who seek to develop their skills in digital design and launch into this promising field.
goals: Mastering the basic principles of 3D Design, including Modeling, Digital Sculpting, and building 3D Scenes.
Learning about the latest tools and techniques used in character and environment design, such as Blender and Maya, to keep up with the latest developments in the creative and technical market.

Gaining an in-depth understanding of the basics of 3D Modeling, mastering the construction of model meshes (Topology), in addition to learning the principles of Artistic Rendering, which establishes a strong foundation for launching into the fields of games and animation.
Implementing applied projects that simulate design challenges in the fields of games and animation, contributing to the application of acquired skills and enhancing practical understanding.
Training on using professional tools like Blender, Maya, and Substance Painter to design characters, build 3D environments, and apply realistic Textures and colors.
Mastering the steps of designing and developing integrated 3D scenes, usable within Game Engines or professional artistic projects.
Enhancing creative thinking and problem-solving skills to produce effective and innovative designs within work environments that simulate real challenges.
Understanding market requirements in the field of 3D Design, with a focus on the games and animation industries, and working to develop the artistic and creative skills necessary for career success.
Qualifying participants to build a professional Portfolio, and preparing to obtain accredited professional certificates, enhancing their career opportunities in the local and global market.
Developing the ability to work in a team and collaborate with diverse teams in design, art, and technology fields to ensure the success of creative projects.
Enhancing creative thinking and encouraging participants to innovate visual and technical solutions that meet market needs.
Participating in interactive workshops and discussion sessions with field experts to gain professional insights and realistic knowledge.
Motivating participants to continue learning and self-development to keep up with rapid changes in 3D design technologies.
features: Learning methodology based on practical applications, ensuring the acquisition of skills in an applied and effective manner.

Learning about the latest tools and practices in 3D Design, using Blender for character design, Maya for building environments, and Substance Painter for applying realistic Textures and colors.
Mastering basic concepts in Modeling, organizing 3D model meshes (Topology), in addition to the principles of Lighting, preparing Textures, and artistic design methods for games and animation.

title: Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC)
description: The GRC bootcamp aims to qualify participants by focusing on understanding governance principles and implementation strategies, analyzing and evaluating risks while developing plans to address them. The program includes familiarization with regulations and laws, implementing effective compliance strategies, using common GRC tools and techniques for data analysis and compliance/risk assessment, as well as preparing trainees to obtain recognized GRC certifications. It also involves implementing practical projects to apply acquired skills and building a GRC framework for a virtual organization.
goals: Understanding operating systems and networks. Ability to use process analysis and design tools.
Familiarity with Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and their application.
Acquiring practical skills in governance, risk management, and compliance.
Developing skills in risk analysis and assessment.
Applying governance concepts and compliance with legislation.
features: Linking theoretical knowledge and skills with practical capabilities through discussing real-world cases from global and local companies in Saudi Arabia
Working on developing policies and controls for real cases, conducting cybersecurity risk assessments for actual issues, and performing compliance evaluations for real scenarios.
requirements: Applicant must be of Saudi nationality.
Personal laptop.

title: Security Operations Center - Level 1
description: The bootcamp aims to equip students with the fundamental knowledge and practical skills needed to succeed in Level 1 or 2 Security Information Analyst (SOC) positions. By exploring key topics such as phishing attack analysis, incident response procedures, threat detection methods, log reviews, SIEM system operation, and security tools usage, students will gain the essential skills required to monitor, investigate, and handle security incidents in a SOC environment.
goals: Understanding the fundamental principles and practices of security operations.
Learning techniques to analyze and detect phishing attacks.
Mastering the use of SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) systems to analyze events, correlate them, and manage security incidents.
Utilizing threat intelligence to enhance security operations and improve incident response.
Understanding digital forensics processes, common tools, and methodologies used.
Acquiring skills in monitoring and analyzing security events on individual systems.
Developing skills in monitoring network traffic to detect security threats and abnormal patterns.
Learning best practices and procedures for incident response in a SOC environment.

title: Mobile and Web Application Development Using Flutter
description: The Flutter and Dart application development bootcamp offers you a comprehensive experience to acquire programming skills from basics to professional application publishing. You will learn Dart language fundamentals, design distinctive user interfaces using Flutter, understand differences in mobile application development, in addition to how to use third-party libraries, work with APIs, and connect applications to servers, with focus on advanced techniques that support your career path and qualify you for the job market.
goals: Introducing participants to Dart language and Flutter framework, focusing on accompanying tools, enabling them to develop modern and effective mobile applications.
Applying acquired skills and concepts through practical projects and daily challenges, enhancing participants' analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities.
Teaching participants how to build comprehensive mobile applications including interface design, database connection, and state management using best programming practices.
Preparing participants to handle common challenges that arise during application development by providing practical solutions and effective techniques to improve performance and ensure stability.
Equipping participants with the technical and professional skills needed to meet job market requirements in application development.
features: Designed specifically for beginners: The bootcamp offers progressive content in a smooth style that helps participants build a strong foundation in programming and application development.
Intensive practical learning: The bootcamp includes sessions and practical applications that enhance understanding and develop practical application skills.
Coverage of latest technologies: Familiarity with the latest tools and practices in mobile and web application development using Flutter and Dart.
Real applied projects: The bootcamp gives you the opportunity to implement real projects that solidify your acquired skills and qualify you for the job market.
Job market skills: The program helps acquire the technical skills required in application development, enhancing your career opportunities.
Interactive activities and projects: A learning experience full of fun challenges that integrate learning with application.

Bootcamp presented in Arabic: To ensure information is accessible and easily understood by all participants.

faqs.Do I need prior knowledge of programming: Yes, completion of the Flutter application development path on Sattar platform is required before joining the bootcamp to ensure understanding of fundamentals and maximum benefit from the content.
faqs.Do I need a computer with specific speci: Yes, preferably the device should have good specifications to ensure smooth performance, with recommended RAM of at least 8GB and Intel Core i7 processor or equivalent.
faqs.Is accommodation available for bootcamp: There are special discounts for Tuwaiq Academy students at several hotels and apartments.
faqs.Are there certified certificates?: Yes, the bootcamp offers graduates a certificate certified by Tuwaiq Academy, enhancing their resumes and confirming their successful completion of the program.
faqs.Is the bootcamp fee-based or free?: The bootcamp is completely free, making it a unique opportunity to acquire high-quality skills at no cost.
faqs.What is the bootcamp duration and daily: The bootcamp extends for 4 months, with a daily schedule including 5 training hours per day, and full attendance commitment is required to achieve maximum benefit.
faqs.Does the bootcamp include job market gui: Yes, the bootcamp includes dedicated sessions for CV improvement and interview preparation, in addition to practical tips for entering the job market.
faqs.Will the bootcamp cover skills required: Yes, all skills taught in the bootcamp are carefully selected to meet job market needs and learn to develop modern and innovative applications.
faqs.Is the bootcamp held in-person or remote: The bootcamp is held fully in-person, to ensure direct interaction with trainers and colleagues.
faqs.Is there time allocated for discussion o: Yes, there are times allocated for formal discussions and group activities, in addition to the possibility of communication through the bootcamp's official channels.
faqs.Will all programming terms be explained?: Yes, all important topics and programming terms are explained clearly to ensure full understanding of the content.

title: Cloud Computing Engineering Using Google Cloud
description: The bootcamp aims to qualify trainees with the practical and technical skills needed to design and implement cloud solutions on Google Cloud efficiently and professionally. It covers a wide range of services such as Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, BigQuery, Cloud SQL, in addition to network setup using VPC, Load balancing Cloud CDN, securing cloud environments through identity and permissions management, along with performance optimization, container management, and automation implementation and deployment.
goals: Understanding Google Cloud architecture and managing basic cloud services like Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, and BigQuery.
Interacting with Google Cloud environment through Cloud Console and Cloud Shell to perform cloud tasks.
Setting up and managing cloud networks using VPC, Cloud Load Balancing, and Cloud CDN.
Securing resource access through Cloud IAM and applying best protection practices, key management, and encryption.
Deploying cloud applications.
Monitoring performance and optimizing costs using Cloud Monitoring, Logging, and BigQuery.
Managing billing and usage analysis to adjust costs and optimize resource consumption.
Automating deployment and management processes using Terraform and Cloud Deployment Manager.
Implementing hybrid and multi-cloud solutions through Interconnect and VPN to connect cloud and on-premises infrastructure.
Troubleshooting issues in Google Cloud environment to ensure performance continuity and operational efficiency.
features: Application-based learning methodology.
Stimulating and interactive learning environment that enables collaboration among trainees to enhance learning experience.
Guidance from certified trainers to ensure learning quality and understanding of fundamental concepts.
Preparing participants to obtain Google Cloud certificates like Associate Cloud Engineer, and enhancing opportunities to apply knowledge in daily work.
Enhancing employment opportunities in cloud computing field
Preparing trainees for the job market.
requirements: Applicant must be of Saudi nationality.
Bring a personal laptop.
Bachelor's degree in a technical field.
Commitment to attend all training sessions.
Good level of English proficiency.
Trainee should have basic background in information technology (such as networking, operating systems, and databases) and readiness for hands-on learning and using technical tools.

faqs.Will I be notified of acceptance?: You will be notified of final acceptance via email well before the bootcamp/program starts.
faqs.Is there a certificate after completing: Tuwaiq Academy offers bootcamps and programs with professional certificates in partnership with major global entities, in addition to attendance certificates for all bootcamps and programs.
